meanings.definition: A member of a nomadic Arab tribe.
meanings.sent1: The bedouin traveled across the desert with their camels.
meanings.sent2: I read a book about the bedouin and their traditional lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The bedouin and their camels decided to have a race in the desert.
meanings.sent4: Her free spirit was like that of a bedouin, always on the move.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bedouin riding through the sand dunes stayed with me.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Bedouin people or their way of life.
meanings.sent1: The tent was decorated with beautiful bedouin patterns.
meanings.sent2: She wore a traditional bedouin dress for the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: The bedouin-style tent looked out of place in the modern city.
meanings.sent4: His adventurous spirit had a bedouin charm to it.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bedouin spices filled the air during the feast.
